meanings.definition: A synthetic nucleoside analog used in the treatment of HIV infection.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed stavudine to help fight the virus.
meanings.sent2: Patients take stavudine regularly to manage their HIV.
meanings.sent3: When the virus saw stavudine coming, it knew its days were numbered.
meanings.sent4: Stavudine acted like a brave soldier battling the HIV invaders.
meanings.sent5: The power of stavudine against HIV was like a shield protecting the body.

meanings.sent1: Scientists studied the structure of stavudine to understand its properties.
meanings.sent2: The formula of stavudine is C10H12N2O4.
meanings.sent3: Stavudine and its molecular friends had a party in the lab.
meanings.sent4: The composition of stavudine was like a secret code waiting to be deciphered.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, stavudine revealed its intricate design.
